mainText:
Steve Jobs has always been the man I looked up to all my life, he is the 
one man that i admired the most, he is the one man i want to be when I 
grow up. And when I heard of his death today I was left breathless. But 
what he has done for the world will always remain with us, he has truly 
revolutionized the world.
May he rest in peace.
author: Flavian
